title: XSLT RIP
author: edent
aiHeadline: XSLT takes its final bow, or maybe it's just taking a nap—either way, it's definitely not coming back.

title: Unexpected things that are people
author: lindowe
aiHeadline: You thought your pet rock was just a rock? Think again, buddy.

title: LLMs are steroids for your Dunning-Kruger
author: gridentio
aiHeadline: LLMs: because nothing says 'I'm an expert' like a chatbot that doesn't know what it's talking about.

title: Time to start de-Appling
author: msangi
aiHeadline: It's time to break up with Apple—because who needs another device that just tells you to charge it?

title: Redmond, WA, turns off Flock Safety cameras after ICE arrests
author: dredmorbius
aiHeadline: Redmond shuts down safety cameras after ICE raids—because who needs safety when you're busy arresting people?
